movie.title: A Nice Girl Like You
movie.description_intro: "A Nice Girl Like You" is a romantic-comedy film starring award-winning actresses Lucy Hale (Pretty Little Liars, Truth or Dare), Mindy Cohn (Consequences, The Facts Of Life), Jackie Cruz (Orange Is The New Black), Australian actor Leonidas Gulaptis (The Answer, Gala and Godfrey), and Adhir Kalyan (Rules of Engagement ). Based on the popular memoir by Ayn Carrillo-Gailey, the story follows Lucy Neal (Hale), a violinist who is thrown for a loop when she is accused of being too inhibited by her ex-boyfriend. In an effort to prove him wrong, Lucy creates a rather wild to-do list that sends her on a whirlwind and surprising journey of self-discovery, friendship, and new love.
movie.description_full: "A Nice Girl Like You" is a romantic-comedy film starring award-winning actresses Lucy Hale (Pretty Little Liars, Truth or Dare), Mindy Cohn (Consequences, The Facts Of Life), Jackie Cruz (Orange Is The New Black), Australian actor Leonidas Gulaptis (The Answer, Gala and Godfrey), and Adhir Kalyan (Rules of Engagement ). Based on the popular memoir by Ayn Carrillo-Gailey, the story follows Lucy Neal (Hale), a violinist who is thrown for a loop when she is accused of being too inhibited by her ex-boyfriend. In an effort to prove him wrong, Lucy creates a rather wild to-do list that sends her on a whirlwind and surprising journey of self-discovery, friendship, and new love.

movies.title: The Proposal
movies.summary: For three years, Andrew Paxton has slaved as the assistant to Margaret Tate, hard-driving editor at a New York publisher. When Margaret, a Canadian, faces deportation for an expired visa, she hatches a scheme to marry Andrew - he agrees if she'll promise a promotion. A skeptical INS agent vows to test the couple about each other the next Monday. Andrew had plans to fly home that weekend for his grandma's 90th, so Margaret goes with him - to Sitka, Alaska - where mom, dad, and grams await. Family dynamics take over: tensions between dad and Andrew, an ex-girlfriend, Andrew's dislike of Margaret, and her past color the next few days, with the INS ready to charge Andrew with fraud.

movies.title: Death of a Porn Crew
movies.summary: A satire of the porn industry, it's about three friends who take a cash advance to film a porn for the intimidating Mr. Dong. Once they blow all the money and have no video for him he goes after them for revenge.

movies.title: Spree
movies.summary: Thirsty for a following, Kurt Kunkle is a rideshare driver who has figured out a deadly plan to go viral.
movies.description_full: Thirsty for a following, Kurt Kunkle is a rideshare driver who has figured out a deadly plan to go viral.
movies.synopsis: Thirsty for a following, Kurt Kunkle is a rideshare driver who has figured out a deadly plan to go viral.

movies.title: The Greasy Strangler
movies.summary: The Los Angeles-set tale follows Ronnie, a man who runs a Disco Walking tour along with his browbeaten son, Brayden. When a sexy, alluring woman comes to take the tour, it begins a competition between father and son for her attentions. It also signals the appearance of an oily, slimy inhuman maniac who stalks the streets at night and strangles the innocent, soon dubbed 'The Greasy Strangler.'
